entries.title: Comcast agents mistakenly reject some poor people who qualify for free Internet
entries.description: Comcast reps didn't know the rules, told qualified applicants they weren't eligible.

entries.title: Man simulates time travel thanks to Stable Diffusion image synthesis
entries.description: Fictional travelogue shows man taking selfies in ancient Greece, Egypt, and more.

entries.title: Study: 2017 rise in teen suicide rates due to seasonal shifts, not 13 Reasons Why
entries.description: "We don’t have any evidence to show that 13 Reasons Why had an effect on [teen] suicide."

entries.title: Kremlin-backed hackers targeted a “large” petroleum refinery in a NATO nation
entries.description: As Russia's invasion of Ukraine grinds on, the country's hackers expand their targets.

entries.title: Raspberry Pi 5 not arriving in 2023 as company hopes for a “recovery year”
entries.description: To avoid cannibalizing supply for other Pi products, the next model must wait.

entries.title: Now that COP15’s over, the work needs to start
entries.description: Here’s a quick rundown of what came from this year’s biodiversity conference.

entries.title: Apple’s self-service repairs expand to desktops like iMac, Mac Studio
entries.description: The Mac Studio, M1 iMac, M1 Mac mini, and Studio Display join the program.

entries.title: Lenovo announces cheaper Mini LED monitors with 140 W power delivery
entries.description: Workstation-level power delivery makes Mini LED more attractive to power users.

entries.title: MSG defends using facial recognition to kick lawyer out of Rockettes show
entries.description: MSG Entertainment began quietly using facial recognition at venues in 2018.

entries.title: Framework, Noctua, and other brands add official 3D models to Printables
entries.description: Fan brackets, laptop modules, miniatures, and other files, all in one place.

entries.title: 19 states choke TikTok on gov’t devices; feds push for nationwide restrictions
entries.description: Louisiana and West Virginia join 17 states restricting access on state devices.

entries.title: The deep sea is an unexpected, but at-risk, trove of biodiversity
entries.description: The UN biodiversity conference reminds us how little we know of the deep ocean.

entries.title: It might be time for Apple to throw in the towel on the Mac Pro
entries.description: Opinion: Making the case against Apple's most expensive—and most ignored—Mac.

entries.title: Lenovo updates ThinkPad laptops with fresh CPUs, recycled metals
entries.description: Lenovo's premium laptops see a mild refresh this time around.

entries.title: The USPS now says it will buy 66,000 EVs by 2028
entries.description: The fleet will include 45,000 electric NGDVs and 21,000 other battery EVs.

entries.title: Ukraine to get 10,000 more Starlink antennas; funding problems are “resolved”
entries.description: Ukraine has assurance from Musk and funding deals with EU allies, official says.

entries.title: NASA’s InSight lander has probably phoned home for the last time
entries.description: InSight landed on Mars in 2018 with the aim of studying seismic activity.

entries.title: Automotive chip shortages to continue throughout 2023, industry says
entries.description: Chipmakers are adding more capacity but are effectively sold out until 2024.

entries.title: Reminder: Donate to win swag in our annual Charity Drive sweepstakes
entries.description: There's still time to contribute to this year's charity haul of nearly $12K so far.

entries.title: Porsche’s synthetic gasoline factory comes online today in Chile
entries.description: The Haru Oni plant will scale up from 34,000 gallons to 14.5 million gallons by 2024.

entries.title: Amazon agrees to deal with EU to end long-running data probes
entries.description: Deal serves as a blueprint for the EU's new Digital Markets Act.

entries.title: Webcam buying guide: The Ars picks, from affordable to extravagant
entries.description: Whether you're streaming games or joining Zoom meetings, you've got options.

entries.title: Swatters used Ring cameras to livestream attacks, taunt police, prosecutors say
entries.description: More than a dozen attacks allegedly logged in a single week.
